Class WorkerInfoDAORedisImpl

java.lang.Object
net.greghaines.jesque.meta.dao.impl.WorkerInfoDAORedisImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
WorkerInfoDAO
public class WorkerInfoDAORedisImpl extends Object implements WorkerInfoDAO
WorkerInfoDAORedisImpl gets worker information from Redis.
Author:
Greg Haines
